APP.HEADLINE: Financial Market Research Portal
AUTH.ERROR.LOGIN: Login failed.  Unknown email or bad password
AUTH.ERROR.REGISTER: Registration failed.  Invalid information or server error
AUTH.FIELDS.NAME: Name
AUTH.SUCCESS.REGISTER: Account created. Check your email for email confirmation
PITCH.CURRENCY.DESCRIPTION: Track exchange rates on many foreign currencies. Calculate the conversion rate of your currency against any foreign currency using a free calculator. Stay up-to-date with currency fluctuation and make sound decisions on when to convert
PITCH.CURRENCY.TITLE: Currency Exchange Rates
PITCH.HISTORICAL.DESCRIPTION: Build one or more portfolios and get immediate access to historical data, analyze trends moving average, yields and more.  Include your important positions in a common dashboard for easy access
PITCH.HISTORICAL.TITLE: Current and Historical Data
PITCH.MONITOR.DESCRIPTION: Stay informed and in control by make speedy decisions based on near real-time analysis of relative data and news.  Make informative decisions by having relative data made available to you when it matters
PITCH.MONITOR.TITLE: Monitor and Analyze
PITCH.PLATFORMS.DESCRIPTION: Access your portfolios anywhere, anytime and on any device. Access on mobile, tablet, laptop or desktop is easy. Just use your favorite browser and you are set
PITCH.PLATFORMS.TITLE: Portal Access Across All Platforms
VALIDATION.INVALID_FULL_NAME: Full name must include name and surname
VALIDATION.INVALID_PASSWORD: Invalid password. Minimum of 6 characters and must contain a number
VALIDATION.INVALID_PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION: Both passwords must be the same
